lexUnit.name: sobering.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: brings about sober and serious feelings

sentence.text: Her role has the same sobering effect on the atmosphere of the ballet as that of Bratfisch , the Count 's valet , in Mayerling .
Nevertheless , the fact that the matter had come to such a head did have a sobering effect on them both .
Zamaron bought the paintings of both Modigliani and Utrillo and let them out after a sobering night in the cells .
He does a similarly good job on energy , with some sobering figures on inefficiency and the build-up of toxic waste .
Herr Alpeter said that such dogs were sold to foreign countries -- a sobering thought .
One of the most sobering institutions in Hampden Babylon is marriage .
Not so many years ago , museums were definitely rather sombre and sobering places .
At Cosford I received a sobering shock , being beaten by Lincoln Asquith in the 60 metres .
` That 's why our League position is a sobering reminder to us .
It was a sobering experience .
They rejoice that their pews are full , without facing the sobering fact that they are only filling them by emptying someone else 's .
“ It is a sobering thought . ”
For the SSDs concerned , one observer described it as : ` A pretty sobering experience .
Frightening thoughts , but ones that serve as sobering reminders of the need to protect your loved ones with life insurance .
The most sobering results came on the patent front .
Once again he was in the sobering presence of violent death .
Unconsciously she put up a hand to that fatal head of hair , and her fingers , coming into contact with the enveloping white cap , brought her a sobering thought .
Their presence in public always had a most sobering effect upon the more drunken clientele .
It was a celebration of life , but it also had a sobering effect .
It was -- quite literally -- a sobering experience .
If so , this was a species of pride which he subsequently overcame , no doubt partly as a consequence of his sobering experiences during this time .
It was a sobering thought , but one that was whipped out of her mind by Travis 's return .
